name: Dark Shambler
description:
Entered via: Rot rift #20211022
Power level: Creeper
Size: 7 feet/ 2.13 meters tall
Aspect: Darkness
Secondary Aspects: None

Dark Shamblers are Darkness demons who literally shamble about in the darkness. They don’t have eyes, but navigate through both sound and vibrations (able to lock onto the elevated heartbeats of humans running from it) from the two fleshy appendages on its head. These two appendages also act as proxy arms, grasping prey once it's been immobilized by the Shambler’s venomous stinger filled with fast-acting paralytic compounds.

Dark Shamblers are Creeper-level demons that move slightly slower than the average human’s run, but have tremendous stamina and will usually outlast prey in a hunt; it’s tremendous torso crashing into and through most static obstacles. That said, due to their lack of sight and relative carelessness in which they move, they are more vulnerable to traps, especially those that target their thin legs.
